ui.panel.config.energy.caption: Energy
ui.panel.config.energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption

ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Stroumnetz
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows ioBroker to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Pick a sensor which measures grid consumption in either of {unit}.
Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Pick a sensor which measures grid production in either of {unit}.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
I do not get money back
Use an entity tracking the total recieved money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Solar Panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let ioBroker monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_return: Solar energy returned to the grid
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production

ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.enti: Pick a sensor which measures solar energy production in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Adding solar production forecast information will allow you to quickly see your expected production for today.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Home Battery Storage
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.dialog.en: Pick sensors which measure energy going in to and out of the battery in either of {unit}.
Energy going in to the battery
Energy coming out of the battery

ui.panel.config.energy.gas.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.paragr: Gas consumption is measured either as the volume of gas that flows to your home or as the amount of energy contained in the gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.entity: Pick a sensor which measures gas consumption in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.note_p: Note: It is not possible to add both sensors measuring a volume of gas and sensors measuring the amount of energy contained in the gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_p: Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_s: Use an entity tracking the total costs
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_e: Use an entity with current price

Update the unit of all sensors
The unit system has been changed, and the unit of some sensors like distance and speed can be updated.
The unit of sensors where the unit has been edited from the UI or which can't be edited from the UI will not be updated.
Note: The unit of temperature sensors is always updated.
The unit of sensors will be updated
The unit system has been changed, and the unit of some sensors like distance and speed will be updated.

ui.panel.config.voice_assistants.assista: Give your assistant a name and select your language. Depending on this language, you may be able to choose region specific variants below.
The conversation agent is the brains of your assistant and will process the incoming text commands.
When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the speech-to-text engine turns your voice command into text.
When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the text-to-speech engine turns the conversation text responses into audio.
You should have an active cloud subscription to use cloud speech services.
Control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled or Alexa-enabled device.
Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you using our neural-network powered speech-to-text and text-to-speech services.
Do you want to expose {entities} entities to {assistants}?
Do you want to stop exposing {entities} entities to {assistants}?
Configured in YAML, not editable in UI

ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Steier vun ënnerwee aus an integréier mam Alexa an Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud liwwert Iech eng sécher Fernverbindung op Är Instanz wann Dir ënnerwee sidd. Et erlaabt Iech och mat Cloud Servicer ze verbannen: Amazon Alexa a Google Assistant.
Dëse Service gëtt vun eisem Partner geleet
, eng Firma gegrënnt vun de Grënner vun ioBroker an Hass.io.
ioBroker Cloud ass een Abonnementsservice mat engem Mount gratis Testperiod. Keng Bezuleinformatiounen néideg.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: Dir musst ärt Passwuert änneren, ier dir iech alogge kënnt.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: Dir musst är E-Mail confirméieren ier dir iech verbanne kënnt.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.cloud_pipeli: Want to use ioBroker Cloud for your voice assistant?
We created a new assistant for you, using the superior text-to-speech and speech-to-text engines from ioBroker Cloud. Would you like to set this assistant as the preferred assistant?

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entitéiten
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: ioBroker hält eng Lëscht vun all Entitéit's ID déi eenzel erkennbar ass a bis elo vum System erkannt gouf. All eenzel vun dësen Entitéite kritt eng ID zougewise welch nëmme fir dës Entitéit reservéiert ass.
Benotzt d'Lëscht vun den Entitéite fir d'Nimm z'änneren, d'Entitéits ID z'änneren oder d'Entrée aus dem ioBroker ze läschen.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: Dës mecht sie rëm am ioBroker siichtbar wann sie fir de Moment deaktivéiert sinn.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Deaktivéiert Entitéiten ginn net am ioBroker bäigesat.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: Du solls dës aus der Lovelace-Konfiguratioun an Automatiséierunge läschen, falls se dës Entitéiten enthalen.

Nëmmen {removable} vun den ausgewielten {selected} Entitéite kënne geläscht ginn. Entitéiten kënne nëmmen geläscht ginn wann eng Integratioun déi Entitéiten net méi zur Verfügung stellt. Heiansdo muss ioBroker frësch gestart ginn fir Entitéiten vun enger geläschten Integratioun ze läschen. Sécher fir déi läschbar Entitéiten ze läschen?

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.tr: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.ru: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.he: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.intro: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.traff: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.heali: Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.netwo: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The ioBroker and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?

WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your controller if you do not use the right firmware files, or if you attempt to stop the firmware update before it completes. The ioBroker and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your controller as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your controller. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}. Note that once you start a firmware update, you MUST wait for the update to complete.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
The firmware update is complete! Your controller is being restarted and your network will temporarily be unavailable.
